=== About Me ===
Hi! My name is Trần Duy Hùng (my last name is Trần and my first name is Hùng), I'm from Viet Nam. I've used Linux and Ubuntu since 2008. I'm a translator for Ubuntu, Lubuntu, LXDE, Debian, LibreOffice and my goal is to help people in my country get familiar with Linux/Ubuntu.

=== Contact Information ===

* IRC nickname: hungtran
* Launchpad account: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~tranduyhung|tranduyhung]]</nowiki>

=== My Current Works ===
* Web developer.
* Translator for Debian, Ubuntu, Lubuntu, LXDE, LibreOffice,...
* Introduce, make tutorial and screencast about Linux and open source on my blog.
* Introduce about Linux/Ubuntu/Open source to Vietnamese people, especially young people like students.
